name: George of the Jungle and the Search for the Secret
synopsis: Swing into the jungle with George of the Jungle. George lives in and protects the jungle of Mbebwe, a wild playground packed with quirky creatures, vicious villains and wacky wilderness adventures. Hang out with his best buddy, an Ape named Ape, his friends Ursula and Magnolia, his faithful dog Shep (actually an elephant) and Tookie Tookie Bird. Laugh your way through an assortment of obstacles while collecting bonus items along the way. Just watch out for that tree!
